scripts.dev:up: [ -f .env ] || cp .env.example .env && npm run services:up && npm run db:setup && export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && turbo dev
scripts.services:up: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres redis --wait
scripts.db:setup: DATABASE_URL=postgresql://alexandria:alexandria@localhost:5433/alexandria npm run db:migrate -w @alexandria/backend && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://alexandria:alexandria@localhost:5433/alexandria npm run db:seed -w @alexandria/backend
